item.title: MCP and the innovation paradox: Why open standards will save AI from itself
item.description: Much like HTTP and REST standardized how web applications connect to services, MCP standardizes how AI models connect to tools.

item.title: Fine-tuning vs. in-context learning: New research guides better LLM customization for real-world tasks
item.description: By combining fine-tuning and in-context learning, you get LLMs that can learn tasks that would be too difficult or expensive for either method
